```{Rcpp, cache=TRUE}

#include <iostream>
#include <utility>
#include <string>

#include <Rcpp.h>

// [[Rcpp::plugins(cpp17)]

// [[Rcpp::export]]
int fibonacci(int x)
{
  const auto [a, b] = std::make_pair(0, 1);
  if (x == 0 || x == 1)
    return x;
  return fibonacci(x-1) + fibonacci(x-2);
}
```
